mapper.insert: insert into memimpression (id, memberid, tomemberid, baseid, impressionname) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tomemberid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{baseid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{impressionname,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

id,

mapper.update:
update memimpression
memberid = #{memberid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tomemberid = #{tomemberid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
baseid = #{baseid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
impressionname = #{impressionname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into memimpression (memberid, tomemberid, baseid, impressionname) values
(#{item.memberid}, #{item.tomemberid}, #{item.baseid}, #{item.impressionname})
mapper.select:
select (CASE when mi.baseid <> '' and mi.baseid is not NULL then ib.`name` when mi.baseid = '' || mi.baseid is NULL then CAST(mi.impressionname AS CHAR CHARACTER SET utf8) else '' END ) name,
COUNT(*) nums from memimpression mi left join impressionbase ib on ib.id = mi.baseid where mi.tomemberid = '${id}' group by mi.baseid,mi.impressionname
